Description:
OAuth token of the running user. Available only if the named credential uses OAuth authentication.

req.setHeader('Authorization', '{!$Credential.OAuthToken}');

Valid values depend on the authentication protocol of the named credential.
• Basic—password authentication
• Bearer—OAuth 2.0
• null—no authentication
